headline: NRG Energy Updates 2026 Guidance and Announces Full Year and Fourth Quarter 2025 Earnings Call
summary: HOUSTON, February 02, 2026--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NRG) today announced updated 2026 financial guidance following the close of its acquisition of a portfolio of assets from LS Power on January 30, 2026. The updated guidance reflects approximately 11 months of ownership of these assets in 2026.
